extendedInfo.description: The average adult needs at least four 90-minute sleep cycles for a good night's sleep.Bedtime Calculator as three modes:Wake up at:Determine what time you should go to bed if you need to wake up at a specific time.Go to bed now:If you go to bed now, what time should you wake up?Go to bed at:What time you should wake up if you go to bed at a certain time.Bedtime Calculator Premium is out now and has no ads and will receive new features first.Planned features:Reminder notificationsGraph your sleep patternsSoothing sounds to lull you to sleepAlarmYou can get it on the market here:https://market.android.com/details?id=com.burk.bedtimeproInspired by http://sleepyti.meTags: Sleepytime, sleepyti.me, sleepy time, bedtime, calculator, sleep cycle, circadian rhythm

reviews.title: Highly instrusive ads.
reviews.comment: Not that useful and the adverts for the paid version that take up 2/3 of the screen put me off buying, and why does it need full access to my calander events. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying Ads!
reviews.comment: The advertisement for the premium version makes the app experience bad. I, like many others, are likely to buy a premium version of a useful, free app. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: simple & easy to use
reviews.comment: this is good, it has minimum permissions which means it will use less of the androids operating power and means that there is minimum data tracking. well done with the app i like it and use it as a guide of when i should go to bed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay...
reviews.comment: Not bad, but there are others just like it that don\'t keep telling u to go buy the paid version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: Ads are one thing, but why annoy users by additional prompting and interference? Uninstalling for Sleepyti.me app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Annoying ads
reviews.comment: I expect ads w/free app but everything single time I open it? Starving student thing is lame.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A nag screen after every operation; super irritating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: You should wake up 6h, 7.5h or 9h after falling asleep. That\'s whole app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: there\'s a pop up that blocks out the information in a attempt to force you buy the paid version

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Really works quite well

reviews.title: Bad ad
reviews.comment: The ad for the paid version is what prevents me from paying. Uninstalling.

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app I would suggest you add an alarm clock for the calculated wake up times.

reviews.comment: This is a fabulous little ap that actually works! Simple and accurate. Try it and see!

reviews.comment: So simple and so brilliant. It would be even better if it had a widget and it showed AM and PM wake up times like the original website.

reviews.comment: This is brilliant, it tells me how little sleep I\'m getting compared to my optimum!

reviews.comment: I will give it five stars when it gets rid of the promo for premium every time i check on a time! :)
